text: Powering the future of AI-driven workflows! AMD Ryzen™️ AI 300 PRO Series stands out with 'superior multitasking, AI acceleration, and extended battery life compared to Intel Core Ultra. With up to 12 high-performance cores and 50 TOPS of AI power, AMD ensures seamless efficiency for enterprise applications. You can experience industry-leading security, optimized performance, and next-level computing designed for modern professionals. The future is AI-powered—are you ready?

Life update, this didn’t happen overnight, in case you’re quick to jump to conclusions. For the last 5 years, I’ve worked 14-15+ hours a day. If you zoom in on the submission time in the left picture, you’ll get an idea. Balancing a full-time job, studying, and recording videos late at night hasn’t been easy. But it was worth it. All I can say is thank you 🙏🏻 Keep working hard, there’s no substitute for it.

Where is takeUforward heading? This is a question everyone is asking. Our vision is to offer a single subscription that covers everything, eliminating the need to purchase multiple courses or premium plans. What the current TUF+ subscription offers - DSA (Beginners to Advanced) - DSA (Last month/week preparation) - Core Subjects (Notes + Videos rolling out) - OOPs (Videos + Practice) - Practice portal (company tags, hints, interview follow-up questions, most frequently asked doubts, AI doubt support) - Daily planner - Customised roadmap according to your number of days - High quality write-ups for everything to make revision easy. - Download (all) notes feature for revision. What we are adding in V3 - LLD (videos + practice) - Aptitude - 700+ premium questions for practice. - Company tag filter (listwise) - DSA (WITCH) Valentine’s day sale is on: https://lnkd.in/dvHnSdBc Use code: 35KATEGA

Marketing has evolved widely over the years, from radio ads with just audio to print advertisements and now an entirely digital era. With Valentine's Week in full swing, multiple brands are launching creative marketing campaigns, as it is known to be the peak season for gifting. One campaign that stood out to me was a unique print ad in The Times of India by Fabelle Chocolates that I saw yesterday. At first glance, the ad appeared quite minimalistic, but it featured a QR code that, when scanned, unlocked a great VR experience. This campaign was innovative and also perfectly aligned with their brand messaging. The ad had royalty, luxury, and premium appeal in every aspect. Shoutout to the copywriter who thought of the sweet and witty one-liners for each element. Chocolates and Valentine’s Day are inseparable, and introducing such an interactive concept while highlighting flavours inspired by nature is a smart move: earth, water, fire, air and space. While reading the article states having a sensorial taste with each bite and honestly, with ingredients like Acacia Nectar, French Sea Salt, Candied Mango, and Ancho Chilli I don't doubt them. Promoting premium products is always a challenge, but leveraging advanced VR marketing would help this campaign gain more traction. I know for sure my team and I would love to get our hands on this!

It took me 5 years to get a dedicated studio for myself 🙌 Most of my previous videos were shot at 12-3 AM, when I got time after my work also primarily to avoid outside noise. Now I can shoot during evening hours too. Whatever you do, give your all, and it will give you back in some way or the other 😇

Quick commerce has transformed the way we shop. It has over 25 million active users who rely on it for essentials as it delivers super quickly. This was all made possible by modern technology, particularly AI-powered algorithms, advanced data management, and streamlined customer support systems. For someone like me, living alone, access to medications and healthcare essentials is a top priority. Apollo 24|7 has addressed this need by bringing multiple healthcare services together on one platform. It delivers medicines within 19-29 minutes in 6+ cities and also offers online doctor consultations with other medical services. Also, their Circle Membership adds a lot of value with its benefits. It’s great to see them make such meaningful contributions to society while achieving excellent growth under innovative leadership.

Five years ago, I started with ₹2500 for 3 to 3.5 hours of continuous teaching sessions before I had my YT for an edtech. For about a year, I was teaching for 9–10 hours on Saturdays and Sundays as well. This eventually took a toll on my health, leading to a neck surgery (the scar you see on my neck is a reminder of that). The last online paid teaching session I conducted was a couple of years ago, for ₹75,000 per hour. Since then, I have focused exclusively on being available through my platform takeUforward. Remember, no starting point is too small. With the right mindset and skills, you will eventually achieve success, it can be any profession. I take bi-weekly sessions on TUF+ platform where all of us connect usually: takeuforward.org/plus
